name: Apple Business Tycoon
description:
==============================================================

Apple Business Tycoon

===============================================================

Apple Business tycoon is a simulation management game in which you have to become the No 1 Apple Selling company in the world. You will compete against 3 more companies in the race to become Apple King.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It maybe like many other games but i think it carries a little twist . Your Profit is based on how you manage with transport & apple provider.

Game also has upgrades which help in the gameplay and help you earn more in the long term.

____________________________________________________________________________________________

For Now game is like 20% complete so stay tuned for upcoming devlogs as it will bring more content .

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY :

Buy Apples from The appleman and then use transporter to transport your apples from the shop u bought to your storage.

then sell your apples. If you go beyond -200 you lose.

main objective of the game is to beat your competitors which you can find them in statistics section.

KoloSaft
